title: Week 2 NFL Recap, Analysis; Brees and Big Ben hurt (Football 9/16)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap all the Week 2 Sunday action from around the NFL. The guys discuss injuries to future Hall of Fame quarterbacks Ben Roethlisberger (1:00) and Drew Brees (16:00) and the impact their absence could have on the Steelers and Saints. Then, the SuperFriends detail a wild finish between the Bears and Broncos (29:00), issue an Andy Dalton update (41:00) and breakdown the horrendous Dolphins (44:00) and Antonio Brown's New England debut (51:00). They continue with recaps of Chiefs-Raiders (54:00), Ravens-Cardinals (1:00:00), Falcons-Eagles (1:06:00), Packers-Vikings (1:11:00) and Cowboys-Redskins (1:16:00). Will, Ryan, John and Sean round out their recap by hitting on the final matchups between the Bills and Giants, Texans and Jaguars, Colts and Titans and Lions and Chargers. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
